QxtBlowfish Class Reference
[QxtCrypto module]

Blowfish encryption class. More... 

 #include <QxtBlowfish>
  • List of all members, including inherited members

Public Functions

  • QxtBlowfish ( const QByteArray & key = QByteArray() )
  • ~QxtBlowfish ( )
  • QByteArray key ( ) const
  • void setKey ( const QByteArray & key )
  • QByteArray encrypt ( const QByteArray & data ) const
  • QByteArray decrypt ( const QByteArray & data ) const

Public Static Functions

  • QByteArray encrypted ( const QByteArray & data , const QByteArray & key ) static
  • QByteArray decrypted ( const QByteArray & data , const QByteArray & key ) static

Detailed Description

Usage:

QxtBlowfish fish;
fish.setKey("foobar").

QByteArray data("barblah");
data = fish.encrypt(data);
data = fish.decrypt(data);

Member Documentation

QxtBlowfish ( const QByteArray & key = QByteArray() )

Constructs a new QxtBlowfish with key.




~QxtBlowfish ( )

Destructs the QxtBlowfish instance.




QByteArray key ( ) const

Returns the key.




void setKey ( const QByteArray & key )

Sets the key.




QByteArray encrypt ( const QByteArray & data ) const

Encrypts data.

See also: setKey()




QByteArray decrypt ( const QByteArray & data ) const

Decrypts data.

See also: setKey()




QByteArray encrypted ( const QByteArray & data , const QByteArray & key ) static

This is an overloaded member function, provided for convenience. This version can be invoked without first instantiating a QxtBlowfisn object.

Encrypts data with key.




QByteArray decrypted ( const QByteArray & data , const QByteArray & key ) static

This is an overloaded member function, provided for convenience. This version can be invoked without first instantiating a QxtBlowfisn object.

Decrypts data with key.
